overview:
Dave MacKay is also a visionary, with a keen eye on the forces that are changing the business world today, and the strategies being deployed to shape the future.

Dave has extensive experience in senior leadership roles in the technology industry. He joined Ceridian over 15 years ago and has contributed significantly to the company’s growth and success, especially in the areas of strategic planning, product development, business process outsourcing, and sales and marketing.

Dave led the creation of Ceridian’s Powerpay Web, the first 100 percent Internet-based payroll service in Canada. Today, Powerpay Web is the Internet payroll service of choice and is used by more than 10,000 Canadian companies.
